Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th: due to street blockage near 115th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth,115th and over regular route: due to street blockage near 115th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/63rd
ShortDescription: SB 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Ford City, Cicero, 67th, Pulaski, 63rd and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Ford City, Cicero, 67th, Pulaski, 63rd, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/63rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Congress/Millard
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Hamlin and Congress; 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted WB: Jackson, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Congress/Millard, due to street blockage near Congress/Millard.

Westbound #7 Harrison buses will operate via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Hamlin, Congress and over regular route.

Westbound #126 Jackson buses will continue westbound on Jackson over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
